DataSourcePortable.Name: Processos executados
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT NOME,
 CRIADOEM,
 INICIO,
 FIM,
 VALORINICIAL,
 VALORFINAL, 
 CPU TEMPO_CPU,
 SITUACAO,
 HOST,
 AGENDAMENTOLOG LOG_AGENDAMENTO
 FROM Z_PROCESSOS
WHERE INICIO >= @ADICIONARMESES(@HOJE, -1)
ORDER BY INICIO DESC" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <DateField Alias="CRIADOEM" From="A" Path="CRIADOEM" FieldDateFormat="DayMonthYear" FieldTimeFormat="HourMinuteSecond" /> <DateField Alias="INICIO" From="A" Path="INICIO" FieldDateFormat="DayMonthYear" FieldTimeFormat="HourMinuteSecond" /> <DateField Alias="FIM" From="A" Path="FIM" FieldDateFormat="DayMonthYear" FieldTimeFormat="HourMinuteSecond" /> <Field Alias="VALORINICIAL" From="A" Path="VALORINICIAL" /> <Field Alias="VALORFINAL" From="A" Path="VALORFINAL" /> <DecimalField Alias="TEMPO_CPU" From="A" Path="TEMPO_CPU" FieldDecimalsFormat="0" /> <Field Alias="SITUACAO" From="A" Path="SITUACAO" /> <Field Alias="HOST" From="A" Path="HOST" /> <Field Alias="LOG_AGENDAMENTO" From="A" Path="LOG_AGENDAMENTO" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
